channel.title: Item buying/seliing price?
channel.description:
hi i got a problem with changing selling price.
this is how it looks: [code]item = 15334 Bandos_godsword x 190000000 200000000 180000000 0 130 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 155 8[/code]
but this is how it look's like in the shop: [url=http://img147.imageshack.us/my.php?image=bandostu3.png][img=http://img147.imageshack.us/img147/2840/bandostu3.th.png][/url]
plz help
